ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: The nicest thing about the Gypsy Lute is it is No Drop. :) All bard items should be No Drop. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
The nicest thing about the Gypsy Lute is it is No Drop. :) All bard items
should be No Drop.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 6:29 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
>
>
> Hang out in Mistmoore and maybe you can get one from a gypsy
> musician. The
> gypsy lute adds 5% and a +mr stat. Nice little touch. Then
> you are kinda
> screwed until you can get a 7 string lute from the Maestro in
> Hateville.
> They could use a nice magic string instrument with 15-20%
> bonus for the mid
> levels to acquire.
>
> Sylly
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 8:18 AM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
>
>
> > I'm finding, at lvl 26 that I use my lute an aweful
> > lot now....Lamant, Hymm, Lullaby and CoD.
> >
> > Be nice to have a magic lute;-)
>
>
>
